long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a ringing simulator designed to work with ringingroom.com. It listens to "look to" and "stand" commands from the person running the simulator, and will ring all unassigned bells in the method selected.

--- PLEASE NOTE ---
The functionality of this simulator has been superseded by an official simulator on RingingRoom. This simulator will remain available for installation, but may no longer function correctly. 

To run the simulator, install it, and go to a tower room on RingingRoom. You should see a bell icon in the bottom righthand corner of the room. Click on the icon to open the simulator panel, which activates the simulator. 

You can now ring any method with any number of ringers!

If you need more assistance, please click the '?' at the top of the simulator panel. 

If the icon doesn't appear in the bottom righthand corner of the window, or any other technical issues occur, please contact dev@offenwanger.ca and I'll see what I can do.
